WorkItem.Description:
Hi
 
I have a destro warlock geared with some normal DS/VP gear/HoT heroics when I optimize my gear via rawr it tells me to reforge all my gear with mastery, but I have read that mastery is the worst stat in a destro lock.
 
Can someone please confirm me if rawr is right and should I reforge or its using an old tier modules and its outdate?
 
Thanks

Comments.Message:
The Rawr.Warlock module is out of date and should not be used for your gear decisions.

Go use MrRobot's gear optimizer instead:
- http://www.askmrrobot.com/wow
